name: Dot Indicator
description: Animated dot indicator for carousels/steppers with optional tap behavior.

use: you need a compact pager indicator.
avoid: text labels are required for navigation.

patterns.title: Clickable dots
patterns.code:
DotIndicator(
  index: currentIndex,
  length: 5,
  onChanged: (next) => setState(() => currentIndex = next),
)

theming: `DotIndicatorTheme` controls spacing, padding, and default dot builder.
accessibility: Provide additional labels when dots represent critical steps.
do: Keep `length` in sync with content pages.
dont: Use dots as the only navigation for long lists.
